short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Darken the background on Youtube or Dailymotion so you can enjoy watching the videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Darken the Background fades the entire page to dark except for the video you are watching. So you will have more comfortable watching experience.

Currently works on Youtube, Dailymotion and Vimeo. We'll support more websites soon.

This extension is ad-free.
